short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances Amazon by easily viewing Reddit Discussions for products

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays Reddit posts for Amazon products. Program loads Reddit links sorted by comments and displays the subreddit and author for each post. Great for getting more information about products through Reddit Posts.
